para.text: accepted by Walls are plain text files with extension SRV that you create directly, using either your favorite editor or, more likely, the editor built into Walls. The files should resemble lines of measurement data written in field books. For information on their required format, see
. Unlike project script files (extension WPJ ), the SRV files cannot have long names. Ordinarily, data files will share the same disk directory as the WPJ script; however, the
of project tree items can be used to relocate them. See
